about_the_game:
This soundtrack includes all the synth tracks that haunt your space cleansing quest in space.

I don't know if you will ever reach the milestones in the game to face the ghastly menace of more threatening aliens such as The Space Ghouls or the unyielding Orman Empire. If the game was too hard for you, you still have the chance to listen to what the soundtrack was for those deadly enemies...
